name: Wallace & Gromit Adventures
summary: Meet Wallace and Gromit! Mind-blowing adventures are waiting for you in Wallace and Gromit Adventures. Help Wallace complete the levels, collecting various objects and schemes for building crazy cars. The game has more than 10 worlds and 3 bosses.
